title: Tomoe Yamane
summary: Tomoe Yamane (山根 朋恵, Yamane Tomoe, born March 24, 1986 in Mihara) is a Japanese ice hockey defender.
content:
Tomoe Yamane (山根 朋恵, Yamane Tomoe, born March 24, 1986 in Mihara) is a Japanese ice hockey defender.


== International career ==
Yamane was selected for the Japan women's national ice hockey team in the 2014 Winter Olympics. She played in all five games, scoring one goal.Yamane also played for Japan in the qualifying events for the 2014, 2010 and 2006 Winter Olympics.As of 2015, Yamane has also appeared for Japan at six IIHF Women's World Championships, with the first in 2001.


== Career statistics ==
